data.title: Mabel Leung on LinkedIn: #singapore #architecture
data.meta_description: Despite having lived in Singapore for more than four years, there are still interesting things to discover and explore.  Look at these amazing architectures‚Ä¶
data.text:
my heart and prayers go to those that lost their family in the landslide in Pupua New Guinea on last Friday. Let‚Äôs not lose hope as the search and rescue team continue their work and let‚Äôs pray for miracles for more survivors.

Great to be back in this beautiful country of Papua New Guinea to commission the expansion of our fuels terminal in Port Moresby, positioning Mobil to be the reliable, trusted supplier of quality fuels that is essential to the economic development of this country. #papuanewguinea #reliability #fuels

We are so excited to collaborate with dnata to provide Esso Renewable Diesel R20 in support of dnata's and Civil Aviation Authority of Singapore‚Äôs sustainability goals. Renewable diesel is an engine-ready GHG emission-reduction solution that leverages our existing supply capabilities to customers. The partnership reflects our ability to offer lower-GHG emission solutions for the transportation sector, in Singapore and the Asia-Pacific region.

Mobil Indonesia mining conference, supported by the top 5 mining industry association in Indonesia. Well attended event to promote collaboration for a sustainable mining operation and an opportunity to showcase Mobil fuels and lubricants #mining #mobil #fuels #lubes

My honor to share the stage with Dr. Rebecca Fatima Sta Maria, Executive Director of the APEC Secretariat and Mr Guillermo Ferreyros, CEO of Savia Per√∫ and APEC Business Advisory Council member at the APEC CEO Summit 2024 Global Roadshow in Hong Kong. The topic ‚ÄúA Renewed Sustainability Agenda for AP‚Äù is certainly one that is close to my heart. Glad to have the opportunity to share what ExxonMobil has been doing in this space including Carbon Capture and Storage and Lower Emission Fuels #hongkong #apec #sustainabilty #ExxonMobil #CarbonCapture #Emission
